headline.main: Trending: Possible Trump Court Nominee Mocked Him on Twitter
headline.print_headline: Trending: Possible Trump Court Nominee Mocked Him on Twitter

docs.snippet: An avid Twitter user, Donald Trump has attracted more than his fair share of trolls. Now, he may be ready to name one of them to the Supreme Court....
docs.lead_paragraph: An avid Twitter user, Donald Trump has attracted more than his fair share of trolls. Now, he may be ready to name one of them to the Supreme Court.

headline.main: South Carolina Police Charge 5 Students in Assault Case
headline.print_headline: South Carolina Police Charge 5 Students in Assault Case

docs.snippet: Four South Carolina middle school students have been charged with possession of child pornography and a fifth student has been charged with criminal sexual conduct in connection with the same case, authorities said Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Four South Carolina middle school students have been charged with possession of child pornography and a fifth student has been charged with criminal sexual conduct in connection with the same case, authorities said Wednesday.

headline.main: Steinbrenner Backs Girardi, Blames Players for Slow Start
headline.print_headline: Steinbrenner Backs Girardi, Blames Players for Slow Start

docs.snippet: Hal Steinbrenner had just started his quarterly State of the Yankees session when he asked to switch places with reporters and stood near the side of the lobby at Major League Baseball's headquarters....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hal Steinbrenner had just started his quarterly State of the Yankees session when he asked to switch places with reporters and stood near the side of the lobby at Major League Baseball's headquarters.

headline.main: Illinois Fights US Spy Agency Decision to Stay in St. Louis
headline.print_headline: Illinois Fights US Spy Agency Decision to Stay in St. Louis

docs.snippet: Illinois officials are aggressively fighting the preliminary decision to relocate a federal spy agency to a new site in St. Louis, rather than to a site across the Mississippi River in a suburban area of southern Illinois....
docs.lead_paragraph: Illinois officials are aggressively fighting the preliminary decision to relocate a federal spy agency to a new site in St. Louis, rather than to a site across the Mississippi River in a suburban area of southern Illinois.

headline.main: NAACP Sues Michigan, Governor Over Flint Lead-Tainted Water

docs.snippet: The NAACP is suing the state of Michigan over Flint's lead-tainted water crisis....
docs.lead_paragraph: The NAACP is suing the state of Michigan over Flint's lead-tainted water crisis.

headline.main: Potential Trump High Court Nominee Mocked Him on Twitter
headline.print_headline: Potential Trump High Court Nominee Mocked Him on Twitter

docs.snippet: A Texas judge identified by Donald Trump on Wednesday as one of 11 people he would consider nominating to the U.S. Supreme Court has repeatedly mocked the presumptive Republican presidential nominee on social media....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Texas judge identified by Donald Trump on Wednesday as one of 11 people he would consider nominating to the U.S. Supreme Court has repeatedly mocked the presumptive Republican presidential nominee on social media.

headline.main: Former NFL Player Tim Tebow Writing Book on 'Life's Storms'
headline.print_headline: Former NFL Player Tim Tebow Writing Book on 'Life's Storms'

docs.snippet: A new book by former NFL quarterback Tim Tebow will be a guide on how to handle success and disappointment....
docs.lead_paragraph: A new book by former NFL quarterback Tim Tebow will be a guide on how to handle success and disappointment.

headline.main: Muslim Nations Block Gay Groups From UN Aids Conference
headline.print_headline: Muslim Nations Block Gay Groups From UN Aids Conference

docs.snippet: Major Western nations are protesting a move to block gay and transgender groups from attending a high-level United Nations conference on AIDS....

headline.main: Accused Man's Mental Health, Criminal Record Raise Concerns
headline.print_headline: Accused Man's Mental Health, Criminal Record Raise Concerns

docs.snippet: Russell MacPherson says he doesn't understand why his adult son, who was diagnosed with schizophrenia and received mental health care, was able to buy a handgun police accuse him of using to shoot two police officers last week....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russell MacPherson says he doesn't understand why his adult son, who was diagnosed with schizophrenia and received mental health care, was able to buy a handgun police accuse him of using to shoot two police officers last week.

headline.main: Brighton Reward Hughton With Four-Year Contract
headline.print_headline: Brighton Reward Hughton With Four-Year Contract

docs.snippet: Chris Hughton has signed a new four-year contract with Brighton & Hove Albion two days after they missed out on promotion to the Premier League....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Hughton has signed a new four-year contract with Brighton & Hove Albion two days after they missed out on promotion to the Premier League.
